name: BEN-MD
description: Alpha is a multidevice WhatsApp bot built to make your WhatsApp enjoyable.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Enable anti-delete message (set 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate)

ANTICALL_MSG.description: Type your anticall message to always send when calls are declined. You can leave it blank
ANTICALL_MSG.value: This is Keith personal assistant kindly leave a message

BOT_NAME.description: You must give a name for your bot

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Set 'yes' to make your bot public or 'no' to keep it private

SESSION_ID.description: Enter your session ID, the code you receive after scanning the QR code

URL.description: You must add your bot image URL

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your phone number (exclude '+' and area code, e.g., '2547222222233')
